meanings.definition: To make fresh or fresh again
meanings.sent1: After a long nap, I refreshen my mind by taking a walk in the garden.
meanings.sent2: I always refreshen my water bottle before heading out for a run.
meanings.sent3: The chef decided to refreshen the salad with some zesty dressing.
meanings.sent4: The rain refreshened the dry earth, bringing new life to the plants.
meanings.sent5: A good night's sleep can refreshen your body and mind for the day ahead.
